name: s65_scream_button
description: The *Scream Button* is a fun, interactive app designed to provide entertainment through sound and user engagement. It allows users to press a button to hear random screams, record their own screams, and compete with others based on the loudness of their screams. The app brings a quirky and playful element to the user experience, enabling social interaction and laughter.
author: rohit-xo21
